|stockos = Linux;2.6.15;LSDK-7.3.0.300; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 15 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.8 |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE) |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J1,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = looks like it,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |specialfeat = |flags = hg directional, UBNT TDMA |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2593A20;SiGe, 2593A20, 011AJHF;2; ,,, Voltage Regulator;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOZ1212AI;Z1212AI, ZA0C1E;1; |802dot11_protocols = an |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = AIRWIREXXXXXXXXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^AIRWIRE[A-F0-9]{12}$ |default_ch = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/14/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 609722639002 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003Z53K8Q |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9280;AR9280-AL1A, N1X304.00B, 1014, TAIWAN; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The ''[[Ubiquiti Networks]]'' logo, "(C)2009", and "NANOTV" appears to be silkscreened :on the '''airWire''''s board. Per ''UBNT'''s regulatory ID compliance table, the FCC ID of this device is ''SWX-M5''. :The same ID is noted as used by the RocketM5. ''[[OpenWrt]]'' would seem to work fine on this device, when using the ''Rocket M'' build(s). :The standard TFTP flash method for UBNT devices will work fine, as well - you will :need to use the (small) reset button on the back of the unit rather than the larger one. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
